text: hey all--I am getting 22% replies on my cold emails so I wrote this massive 40+ page guide on how I am doing it and how I've done it with my clients: <http://www.sendwithscout.com/article/b2b-cold-email> <-- still a design work in progress so it's a little gross on mobile... but that will be fixed in the next few weeks. Let me know if you have thoughts, if it's confusing, or if you have ideas. I didn't really do it for SEO, just like a good place to dump my knowledge. All criticism / constructive feedback is so welcomed!!

attachments.title: How to Personalize Cold Outbound by Pain (Not Persona) - Scout
attachments.text: Category: Personalized marketing. Scout's definitive guide to creating cold outbound emails that resonate with your prospects, at scale.
